content: who has helped make this pattern possible for more of my pattern designs http //www theautumnacorn com or http //www ravelry com/designers/the-autumn-acorn if you have any questions about this pattern please email judy@theautumnacorn com you can also find me on ig as @theautumnacorn and in my fb group as the autumn acorn knits please tag me in your progress photos with @theautumnacorn and using hashtag #canoeshawl i have a blog where i offer free patterns at www theautumnacorn com and an etsy shop finally don t forget to check out my knitting + crocheting podcast on youtube called the autumn acorn knits https //www youtube com/channel/uctqhow9bvmnp6wbyvgisp8a view_as =subscriber-5- -4- copyright 2020 the autumn acorn pattern is intended for personal use only other uses are strictly prohibited all rights reserved -5- copyright 2020 the autumn acorn pattern is intended for personal use only other uses are strictly prohibited all rights reserved
